[Ivermectin: Much More Than You Wanted To Know](https://astralcodexten.substack.com/p/ivermectin-much-more-than-you-wanted)

[Gelman, Jamaica](https://statmodeling.stat.columbia.edu/2014/08/08/estimated-effect-early-childhood-intervention-downgraded-42-25/)

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

X <- replicate(10**3, rnorm(24, .1, 1), simplify = F)
  
ted_test <- function(vec){
  bar <- t.test(vec)
  qux <- broom::tidy(bar)
  return(qux)
}

xx <- map_dfr(X, ted_test)

xx %>% 
  filter(p.value < .05)
```
